introduction: a short film by Friends Make Film is supported by MSMGF (msmgf.org) and G-link in the subject about "Gay reduce stigma & discrimination and HIV prevention"DescriptionWe may have at least one time to get the memories with the roads. I remember, 5 years ago, on the road in the rainy day of Saigon, there were two young guys just used a small rainy coat to cover them on a old Honda motorbike. The rain was cold, but their laugh brought warm. I have written the story "Waiting for the wind" since that day. Passing on many years with the waves of life, I have not fini...See MorePlot OutlineKhanh and Phong, two different fates, two different lives, have met and loved each other like any other couple. But life itself which is conflicting and has differences pushed them apart. Temptation and adversity almost kill their love, but no, love always has a very personal bias. However; Is a sincere love big enough to tolerate all other reasonable mistakes?
